snippet: The former All-Pro safety Darren Sharper is looking at a long stretch in prison after his lawyer said Friday that he had reached a plea agreement that will settle rape charges involving at least nine women in four states.
abstract: Former All-Pro safety Darren Sharper reaches plea agreement to settle rape charges involving at least nine women in four states; other football news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and BILL PENNINGTON

lead_paragraph: The former All-Pro safety Darren Sharper is looking at a long stretch in prison after his lawyer said Friday that he had reached a plea agreement that will settle rape charges involving at least nine women in four states.
